full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSo) for Language Assessments and French Second Language Training Services

**Solicitation Number:** 5000069543
**Reference Number:** cb-4761-19524197
**Department:** Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC)

**Eligibility:** All qualified vendors are invited to respond to this request for standing offer (RFSo) for language assessments and French second language training services.

**Background:**
The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) requires professional services to provide language assessments and French second language training to its employees. The training may be either full-time, part-time, distance, or in-classroom learning, and may be held at the vendor's premises or CNSC premises.

**Objectives:**

* Provide language assessments to help employees attain or maintain the following levels in their second language:
	+ Levels B and/or C in Reading Comprehension
	+ Levels B and/or C in Written Expression
	+ Levels B and/or C in Oral Proficiency
* Develop and implement a training program to help employees achieve the aforementioned language standards
* Award Departmental Individual Standing Offers (DISO) for a period of 3 years, with the possibility of extending the contract for up to 4 additional 1-year periods

**Terms and Conditions:**

* The Standing Offers that are awarded will be for a period of 3 years, with the possibility of renewal for up to 4 additional 1-year periods
* Mandatory language levels and specifications will be defined in the respective Standing Offers
* Vendors are required to provide rates for each option period, if exercised
* Notice of contract awards and changes will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS)

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-19,
